name: The Adventures Of Meatman
description:
The Adventures of Meatman

A 2D platformer where you play as Meatman, a meatball with a mustache.

This game is still in development. Give us a shout if you like it! Give us a shout if you don't like it!

Created by Matt Kaplan, Judah Terry, Nathan Riffle, Eric Gutowski, Cobie Lovejoy

1 min of gameplay


Boss Fight
